about_the_game:
About This Game

Discover the timeless charm of Sungka, a captivating digital adaptation of the beloved Filipino mancala game. Sungka challenges your strategic skills as you aim to gather the most shells by planning your moves with precision and staying a step ahead of your opponent. Easy to pick up yet endlessly engaging, Sungka delivers a unique blend of strategy and tradition for players of all ages.

Features:

  • Authentic Gameplay: Experience the traditional rules of Sungka, faithfully brought to life in a digital format.

  • Challenge AI Opponents: Hone your strategy against computer players with adjustable difficulty settings.

  • Local Multiplayer: Enjoy competitive play with friends and family on a shared device.

  • Step-by-Step Tutorial: Learn the game’s mechanics with an intuitive guide, perfect for both beginners and experienced players.

  • Serene Aesthetics: Immerse yourself in calming visuals and tranquil music that complement the thoughtful pace of the game.

Whether you’re revisiting childhood memories or discovering Sungka for the first time, this digital version offers an inviting and strategic experience. Can you master the art of Sungka and claim victory?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2011 or later) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (e.g., Intel HD 3000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio supported by macOS
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (e.g., Intel HD 4000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio supported by macOS
